responses: Hello! I'm here to answer your questions about Northwestern University's history.
Hi there! How can I help you learn about Northwestern?
Greetings! Ask me anything about the university's history.
Welcome! I am the Northwestern University History Chatbot. What can I tell you about?

patterns: What year was Northwestern University established?
Sabihin mo sa akin tungkol sa nagtatag
responses: Northwestern University was founded by Nicolas N. Nicolas.
The main founder of the university is Nicolas N. Nicolas.

patterns: When did the school operation stop?
Was there a time that the university closed?
Was there a time the school paused?
Nagkaroon ba ng paghinto sa operasyon?
responses: The operation of the school was interrupted between 1945 and 1948 due to World War II.

patterns: When did it become Northwestern College?
What year was it recognized as a college?
Who was the first president when it became a college?
Sino ang unang presidente noong naging kolehiyo ito?
responses: In 1949, the academy became Northwestern College with Apolinario Aquino as President.

patterns: What year did the criminology program start?
responses: The Bachelor of Science in Criminology was opened in 1969.

patterns: When was the nursing program offered?
responses: The BS in Nursing Program was opened in 1973.

patterns: When did Ben A. Nicolas become president?
Who was the new leader after Nicolas Nicolas?
Kailan naging presidente si Ben A. Nicolas?
Bagong lider pagkatapos ni Nicolas Nicolas?
responses: In 1982, Ben A. Nicolas became President of the College and Chairman of the Board, succeeding his father Nicolas Nicolas.

patterns: When was the computer center opened?
What was the first computer center north of Metro Manila?
Did Northwestern have a computer center?
May computer center ba ang Northwestern?
Ano ang unang computer center sa hilaga ng Metro Manila?
responses: In 1982, Northwestern opened its Computer Center, the first of its kind north of Metro Manila.

patterns: When did it become a university?
What year did Northwestern gain university status?
Who was the first university president?
responses: On November 3, 1992, Northwestern was granted university status, with Jose G. Castro as the first University President.

patterns: When did NWU receive ISO 9001 certification?
responses: Northwestern was granted ISO-9001/1994 certification and later ISO 9001-2000 certification, becoming the first educational institution in the province to achieve this.

patterns: When did Northwestern get deregulated status?
What year did it become deregulated?
responses: In 2003, Northwestern University was granted Deregulated Status by the Commission on Higher Education.

patterns: Does Northwestern have an international sister school?
Which university in Korea is partnered with Northwestern?
When did it forge an international relationship?
May international sister school ba ang Northwestern?
Sino ang partner university sa Korea?
responses: In 2003, Northwestern forged an international sisterhood relationship with Sangmyung University in Korea.
